messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Danielle's blogsite, was new to unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: ... Just clarifying that s all. Yeah, isn t that annoying about the way blogger runs the words together? There s no case sensitivity or underscores, which is
messages.messageBody:
Leslie530@... wrote:

>
> ***********
>
> Oh, I read "organic cleaning".
>
> Can you see what I'm supposed to be doing? :)
>
> Sorry about the mix-up on the blogsite.

Just clarifying that's all.

Yeah, isn't that annoying about the way blogger runs the words together?
There's no case sensitivity or underscores, which is really annoying. It
bugs me to the way it appears in the url, but I liked the name too much
to switch. :)

--
~~Danielle
Emily (8), Julia (6), Sam (5)
http://www.danielleconger.com/Homeschool/Welcomehome.html

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*

"With our thoughts, we make the world." ~~Buddha

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/24/2005 2:21:56 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,
kbcdlovejo@... writes:

Now, just for clarification, that is our website url. Our blog, or web
log, addy is http://www.organiclearning.blogspot.com , which is linked
from my website and is much more fun, imo.

-=-=-

By the way, I just LOVE the term "Organic learning"---that's really
what it IS!




***********

Oh, I read "organic cleaning".

Can you see what I'm supposed to be doing? :)

Sorry about the mix-up on the blogsite.

Leslie in SC


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Danielle Conger <danielle.conger@...>

Now, just for clarification, that is our website url. Our blog, or web
log, addy is http://www.organiclearning.blogspot.com , which is linked
from my website and is much more fun, imo.

-=-=-

By the way, I just LOVE the term "Organic learning"---that's really
what it IS!

-=-=-=-

See what fun we'll have at the Web-based documentation funshop in
October!? ;)

-=-=-=-
I can't wait!

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
October 6-9, 2005
http://liveandlearnconference.org
